<span class="title">dropDestinationIsOuterRoom</span><span class="type">object</span>

<div class="fdesc">

Pre-condition: destination for "drop" is an outermost room. If the drop
destination is a nested room, we'll try returning the actor to the
outermost room via an implicit command.

**`dropDestinationIsOuterRoom`**` :   `[`PreCondition`](../object/PreCondition.html)

</div>
